cards.rules_text:
Reach, trample
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
Whenever Rock-Throwing Tank attacks, you may put a permanent card from your hand or the top of your library onto the battlefield.
When you unlock this door, create four 1/1 red Human Survivor creature tokens.
cards.rules_text2: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have lifelink.

cards.rules_text:
Menace
{1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Bill, the Sacrifice: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
{4}{B}{B}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Bill, the Sacrifice: Destroy all creatures you don't control.
At the beginning of your end step, target player mills two cards. [i](They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2: At the beginning of your first main phase, until end of turn, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback {0}.

cards.rules_text:
Haste
Whenever Startled Witch deals combat damage to a player, it deals X damage to that player, where X is half that player's life total, rounded down.

Flying
Whenever Helicopter Pilot becomes tapped, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
When Helicopter Pilot dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
When you unlock this door, this Room deals 25 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
cards.rules_text2: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.

cards.rules_text:
First strike
Whenever Zoey, Hope Against Hope attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may put it onto the battlefield tapped if it's a land. Otherwise, you may play it this turn.

When Coach, Devoted Leader enters, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls. You gain life equal to the excess damage dealt.
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Coach, Devoted Leader.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“This used to be a nice neighborhood!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
Whenever one or more creatures you control coordinate a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Stay positive, guys! I got a good feeling about this!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Double strike
[i]Morbid[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land enters under your control, draw a card.
cards.rules_text2: [i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

cards.rules_text:
Haste
Whenever an Equipment you control enters, Ellis, Killing Machine deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Kill all sons-a-bitches. That's my official instructions.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch
Virulence costs you pay cost {1} less.
Creatures you control with decayed get +1/+1.

{T}: Surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{6}, {T}, Sacrifice Alarmed Car: Create three 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

Flash
Enchant creature
When Jockey Ride enters, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

Virulence {4}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this spell for its virulence cost. If you do, when it enters, create a token that's a copy of it with decayed.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Lifelink, haste
[i]Morbid[/i] — When Ravenous Horde enters, if a creature died this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. That token gains haste until end of turn.

Coordinate [i](You may tap two creatures you control as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Headshot deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If this spell was coordinated, destroy that creature instead.

Vigilance
When Team Healer enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature you control. You gain 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I know we gotta move, but I gotta heal you!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
Whenever Rooftop Smoker or another creature you control enters, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Watch the rooftops, there's a Smoker around.”
—Zoey[/i]

Virulence {3}{B} [i](You may cast this spell for its virulence cost. If you do, when it enters, create a token that's a copy of it with decayed.)[/i]
When Bilious Boomer dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

Coordinate [i](You may tap two creatures you control as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Molotov Throw deals 3 damage to target creature. If this spell was coordinated, it deals 5 damage to that creature instead.
If a creature dealt damage by Molotov Throw would die this turn, exile it instead.

Virulence {5}{U} [i](You may cast this spell for its virulence cost. If you do, when it enters, create a token that's a copy of it with decayed.)[/i]
When Ensnaring Smoker enters, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]

Flying
Whenever Rocket-Launched Survivor becomes tapped, another target creature you control without flying gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

Coordinate [i](You may tap two creatures you control as you cast this spell.)[/i]
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it's coordinated.
Surveil 2, then draw two cards. [i](To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]

First strike
Whenever Katana Wielder attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

Vigilance
[i]Morbid[/i] — When Expert Tactician enters, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card unless a creature died this turn.

Flying
Whenever Ceiling Hunter attacks, untap up to two target creatures you control.

Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

Flying
Whenever another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

When Noxious Spitter enters, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Whenever Infected Clown attacks, another target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

When Resourceful Survivor enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Let's go find Jimmy Gibbs's stock car. We get that thing gassed up, we can drive outta here.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Affinity for artifacts [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)[/i]
Incendiary Explosion deals 5 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

Flash
When Pipe Bomb enters, sacrifice it. When you do, choose one —
• Tap target creature and put two stun counters on it. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
• Pipe Bomb deals 2 damage to any target.

When Electric Guitar enters, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, target creature can't block it this turn.
Equip {2}

Choose one —
• Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
• Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
